mapper.select: select * from wn_poll ORDER BY deadline ASC
mapper.insert: insert into wn_poll (eventnum, eventtitle, deadline) values (wn_event_seq.nextval, #{eventTitle}, to_date(#{deadLine}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.update: update wn_poll set eventtitle=#{eventTitle}, deadline=to_date(#{deadLine}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where eventNum=#{eventNum}
